amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that, in recognition of the contributions of Donald G. Waldon to the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway, a lock and dam on that waterway should be designated as the "Donald G. Waldon Lock and Dam".

action.text: Amendment SA 894 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Wicker.

vote.text: Amendment SA 894 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
